Articles.Content:
I deorbit your space hill

My hill

I uproot your hill and fling it into Kerbol at 1% the speed of light. 

My hill.

I use life.

My Kerbol Hill.

Telefragged.

My hill.

I build a hill on Moho.

My Mohill

I invert your Mohill into a Mohole. 

My hill.

I fill the mohole into with lava

my hill
I fill it with water and gives the hill to Jeb. Jeb's hill. YOU MAY NEVER DEFEAT THE ALL MIGHTY JEB!!!!!

I hire Jeb for my space program so he gives me the hill.

My mohill.

I order a private army to demolish your space center in order to liberate the hill.

My liberated hill.

I build a new hill on Tylo.

My Tylo hill.

I use HyperEdit to relocate Tylo INSIDE Jool. Then I build a balloon hill to float on Jool.

My balloon Hill.

I send a helicopter to shoot down your ballon.

My helicopter.

I use... Deep Thoughts.

My new hill on Neptune.

I build a new hill on Minnmus.

My Minnmus hill and Jool helicopter.

I dissolve your hill into my Neptune hill.

My composite Neptune hill.

I use red matter on neptune, destroying it and your hill.

My Jool helicopter.
I pour anti-jool matter on said jool helicopter. My hill.

I build a new sewer on Eve.

My Eve sewer.

I flood the sewer on Eve. A couple of hours later I vaporize the water with Jebs Deathray and build a new hill ontop of the sewer-ruins.

My smoking hill.

I put your hill into the explodium sea.

My underwater Eve hill.
I make a hill in a solar orbit beyond Eloo(I'm probably butchering its name, aren't I?)
I hack and Hyperedit the hill into the Sun's atmosphere. I make a hill inside the sun. Without cheats.

Kraken.

My Kerbol hill.

Rocket launcher synchronization gizmo, rocket rain.

Hill.
